## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log or debugging code

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested the changes on mobile devices (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] If dependencies were added, I have justified them in the description
- [ ] I have updated package.json and package-lock.json

### Security
- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated and sanitized user inputs

### Database & Breaking Changes
- [ ] I have created/updated database migrations if needed
- [ ] I have provided backward compatibility for breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
